Text: It won't open for me. I have downloaded it multiple times and still just pops up that it is corrupt.
Sorry The-S-Man if you're having trouble, but there's nothing wrong with the torrent or the .cbz file. The plot of the comic's another case, but this torrent isn't corrupt. :-)

Failed to load in ComicRack. Each image displays an image stating "Page failed to load. Please refresh and try again." 

So I extracted the archive and took a look. Rather than bundling the images into a single archive, the images were archived inside of a folder. This causes a problem with many of the modern viewers.

Man I respect that you two had problems with it, but CDisplayEx loads and displays it fine. If it's a "modern image viewer" it shouldn't have a problem loading and displaying this file. Ditch ComicRack and get CDisplayEx.
Thanks wynterbourne, I will try this out and see if that is the problem.
